data.title: NASSCOM Product Conclave 2018: Full Schedule
data.meta_description: Check out the schedule for NASSCOM Product Conclave 2018
data.text:
9:15am PDT

9:40am PDT

Building Global SaaS Companies from India

Building a world class enterprise product is half the battle, the tougher one is getting global customers and then scaling up. Hear from Girish Mathrubootham, Founder & CEO, Freshworks on lessons learnt in building a global SaaS company from India and what worked for them in a scaling to $100M+ ARR

Thursday October 25, 2018 9:40am - 10:10am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

10:10am PDT

Innovating with a Purpose: How Cutting-Edge Tech is Solving the Biggest Challenges in Health Care

Illness affects us all. And yet, the health care available to us is not nearly good enough. But cutting-edge technologies can help to solve some of the biggest challenges we face. By applying AI, leveraging IoT, implementing blockchain we are creating new answers to age-old problems that, at some point, we all face. Hear how one of the largest and most innovative companies in the health care industry is tackling these challenges as John Santelli, CIO of UnitedHealth Group shares his company’s efforts to make the health system work better for everyone.

Thursday October 25, 2018 10:10am - 10:35am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

10:35am PDT

11:30am PDT

Disrupt!

The speed of innovation and technology changes is at a pace faster than ever. How do companies and individuals succeed and stay relevant in an ever-changing world? Be comfortable disrupting yourself before you get disrupted. Get inspired from real world examples of technology trends and how we apply them.

Thursday October 25, 2018 11:30am - 11:50am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

11:50am PDT

12:10pm PDT

Is the promise of Blockchain real?

Blockchain offers great promise but is still in uncharted territory. According to a recent report, blockchain could take over two percent of corporate servers’ computing power and be a $7 billion dollar market. Janine Grasso will share perspectives on the blockchain ecosystem and the opportunities for building a blockchain unicorn

Thursday October 25, 2018 12:10pm - 12:30pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

12:30pm PDT

Pivoting to a Unicorn

Pivoting is a much accepted and ubiquitous part of the startup growth journey and a Unicorn can never afford to stand still. Most Unicorns have had a pivot at some stage of their journey. Hear from Shaukat Shamim, what are the imperatives before you decide to pivot and how to make this successful

Thursday October 25, 2018 12:30pm - 12:55pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

2:00pm PDT

Candid Conversation with VCs: Decoding the anatomy of a Deal

DeepTech is hot, yet as a startup can you raise money for your DeepTech or Enterprise software products. How do VCs evaluate funding for products, which are the hot spaces, what is a fair valuation. The panel will take use cases and discuss threadbare the anatomy of a deal and what are the key learnings for product startups.

Thursday October 25, 2018 2:00pm - 2:40pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

2:40pm PDT

New Retail & New Tech, the Perfect Storm - A Fireside Chat

AI/ML/NLP, IoT, blockchain and other new technologies have redefined the retail landscale forever. Every retailer is now a technology company, and Walmart exemplifies that shift. The fireside chat will explore the disruption in all facets of retail from merchandising, supply chain, store operations, omni-channel, customer marketing, personalization and the rest, and also shed some light on how the Walmarts of the World are innovating with products, but also collaborating with startups to drive this new paradigm of new retail.

Thursday October 25, 2018 2:40pm - 3:00pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

3:00pm PDT

3:20pm PDT

Design, Differentiate, Disrupt: What keeps the Digital CXOs awake?

With exponential tech shifts, a fast evolving fintech sector, regulatory compliances and other imperatives – how does the Digital CXO design their tech strategy to remain ahead? Is AI the game changes or blockchain; is the new mantra for CX – mixed reality and what is my data strategy that balances innovation and privacy. Leading Digital CXOs debate what lies ahead.

Thursday October 25, 2018 3:20pm - 4:00pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

4:30pm PDT

Founders, Startups and Community

What does it take to be a high growth company, how do you spot the opportunities ahead, what risks do you take, how do you deal with failures. This keynote explores the imperatives for a successful entrepreneur and life lessons leant.

Thursday October 25, 2018 4:30pm - 4:50pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

4:50pm PDT

Design-First Disruption: A Tale of Two Unicorns

AI & ML are reshaping what’s possible across every industry, but without the right user-experience (UX), it’s simply technology for technology’s sake. Embracing a UX-first approach to product development is required to truly create magic adoption at human scale. Come hear Ajeet Singh share his personal experience of building not one, but two unicorns, ThoughtSpot and Nutanix. He will explain how UX-first thinking led to the development of two category-creating products with widespread adoption and business impact.

Thursday October 25, 2018 4:50pm - 5:10pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

5:10pm PDT

Fireside Chat: Getting to Tango: Services + Products, Corporates + Startups

Can a services dominated company build a product / platform mindset or the two are very different. As a big company what value do I get with partnering with startups or what is my acquisition / innovation strategy. This fireside chat will explore the changing nature of the IT services industry and is products / platforms the future.

Thursday October 25, 2018 5:10pm - 5:30pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

5:30pm PDT

Product Mission 2020: Build for India and scale for the world

India has the fastest growing GDP, rapid consumer of data, increasing middle class consumption and very young demographics – all of which are magnets for innovation and startups. Yet most startups build for the world and not for India. Hear from an inspiring leader - Amitabh Kant on how technology startups can create new markets in India, why building for India will create innovative startups.

Thursday October 25, 2018 5:30pm - 6:00pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

6:00pm PDT

Emerge 50 Awards: The League of Ten

The most exciting and awaited awards for innovative growth and early stage startups.

Thursday October 25, 2018 6:00pm - 6:30pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

9:15am PDT

9:20am PDT

Pune to Sunnyvale: Global Model of Success – The Druva Story

How do you build and scale a fast growing enterprise product company that was ideated in Pune and scaled at Sunnyvale. Get insights on key earnings from the Druva Story on building a world class product, the sales engine, the R&D innovation, the partnership and keeping the funding going.

Friday October 26, 2018 9:20am - 9:45am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

9:45am PDT

Fireside Chat: Building superstar teams at super scale

You are a fast growing company and need the best talent to scale. How do you build superstar teams and super speed and scale. The fireside chat will focus on the real life lessons on building a unicorn ventures and the talent / skills strategy. The chat will address questions on building engineering teams - can they be distributed, effective sales team, culture, defining KPIs and metrics and the focus on employee first,

Friday October 26, 2018 9:45am - 10:05am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

10:05am PDT

SaaS Nation - India's Trillion Dollar Opportunity

A lot has been talked about how India is emerging as a SaaS hub and global success stories being built from India. However, what lies ahead – is SaaS saturating, are their opportunities to scale, how are the existing SaaS leaders differentiating to scale. An exciting talk that looks at the SaaS landcsape and a glimpse into the future.

Friday October 26, 2018 10:05am - 10:25am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

10:25am PDT

Security Tokens: The New IPO

Security tokens - Imagine a fully-regulated token that represents shares of a company, the equivalent of issuing company stock on blockchain. The tokens and the company are regulated by the Government, which reduces the chances of a fraud. Or at least enough to get accepted by the institutional regulations. So when we talk about security tokens, that’s where the traditional stocks and the blockchain framework find their way of getting together.

The panel will discuss what lies ahead for Security Tokens, how is this disrupting the capital markets, what are the benefit to regulators and how this will enable trust while disintermediating the middlemen.

Friday October 26, 2018 10:25am - 11:00am PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

11:30am PDT

The two tenets – innovate and scale: Show and Tell

Bored of keynotes and panels and wondering can I really see what some innovative products that have scaled. This session is not about demos but a show and tell where 3 exciting entrepreneurs showcase their innovation and how they are getting customer traction.

Friday October 26, 2018 11:30am - 12:00pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

12:00pm PDT

AI and the future of work

Artificial intelligence is affecting everybody and completely transforming the way we work. As AI’s adoption in the workplace continues to accelerate, we’re faced with two pressing ethical issues: data bias and accountability.

Whether it’s algorithms written by homogenous teams or unrepresentative training data, the risks are clear. Ultimately, for company's AI strategy to succeed, the systems it implements must be fair. For companies seeking to harness the power of AI, while avoiding the potential pitfalls of deployment, the key questions are:

How can we equip ourselves to deal with the issues?

What can organizations do to understand the skills they need?

How is AI going to affect my industry sector or corporate function?

What work is being in done in the intersection between AI, HR and recruitment?

Friday October 26, 2018 12:00pm - 12:30pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

12:30pm PDT

Advanced technologies in accelerating innovation

As multiple technologies intersect, what and how do you keep pace with building the best product. What are Product Management strategies that are being adopted at leading companies?

Speakers

Raj Sethuraman

Chief Technology Officer, Wolters Kluwer

Friday October 26, 2018 12:30pm - 12:45pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

12:45pm PDT

2:00pm PDT

2:20pm PDT

7 Lessons from Israeli Startups

In this fast-paced and action-oriented talk, John will share some of his observations on Israeli Startups - The unique way in which they operate, what helps them succeed globally, and what can Indian startups learn from them today.

Friday October 26, 2018 2:20pm - 2:40pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

2:40pm PDT

AI Research in India: Solving for India

How is AI research in India changing, are we witnessing greater collaboration with industry, will the NextGen DeepTech startups emerge from academia focused on AI research, can we build solutions for India and scale. Debate all this and more in an exciting panel led by Pankaj Mishra.

Friday October 26, 2018 2:40pm - 3:20pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

3:20pm PDT

The Intertwining of Business & Technology

How Businesses across different Industries and Verticals are leveraging technology (including from the start-up ecosystem) in completely new ways as a competitive weapon to get ahead of the curve and competition. Learn from real life examples of the disruption and value that an entirely new set of technologies and business use cases are re-imagining customer experiences and value. The businesses of tomorrow are technology companies at the core.

Friday October 26, 2018 3:20pm - 4:00pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

4:30pm PDT

Mission 2020: Young Innovator Perspective

Friday October 26, 2018 4:30pm - 4:50pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

4:50pm PDT

Intelligence Augmentation: A New Frontier for Humankind

Re-imagining a future that seeks to meld man and machine, such that AI, the Internet, and computing could be weaved with humans as a “second self”. How we could reinvent personal computing, where computing and the interface become internal to a user, as a direct extension of human cognition, thereby augmenting human capabilities.

Friday October 26, 2018 4:50pm - 5:15pm PDT

Aura 1&2 Taj Yeshwantpur, Bengaluru

5:15pm PDT
